Record.ClassificationPath: Behavior and Behavior Mechanisms/Behavior/Behavioral Symptoms/Wandering Behavior
Record.Description: Moving oneself through space while confused or otherwise cognitively impaired. Patterns include akathisia, exhibiting neuroleptic-induced pacing and restlessness; exit seekers who are often newly admitted institution residents who try to open locked exit doors; self-stimulators who perform other activities such as turning doorknobs, in addition to continuous pacing; and modelers who shadow other pacers.
